details.description: Find a lost pension by contacting the Pension Tracing service online
details.more_information:
You need to give the Pension Tracing Service as much information as you can, including whether you’re looking for a workplace pension or personal pension.

If the Pension Tracing Service can find your pension, they’ll give you the address of your scheme provider. It’s up to you to make any further enquiries.

You can also contact the Pension Tracing Service by phone or by post.
